short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save any text with a single click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Snap Text is a super simple Chrome extension that lets you save selected text from web pages quickly and efficiently. Whether youâ€™re researching for a project, reading an article, or coming across crucial information, SnapText ensures you never lose track of important content.

Main features
- Save selected text and its source URL using a simple context menu or a customizable shortcut (Ctrl+Shift+1 for Window or Cmd+Shift+1 for MacOS).
- Display saved text snippets in a sticky note popup.
- Provide options to delete saved snippets if no longer needed
- Notify users upon successful saving.
